argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitdvcl.o | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitdvcl.d | |- ./ = ( /r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_unitcl | |- ( X e. U -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invr ` R ) = ( invr ` R ) |
| 7 | 3, 5, 1, 6, 2 | #P_dvrval | |- ( ( X e. ( Base ` R ) /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( X e. U /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) = ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 6 | #P_unitinvcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ Y e. U ) -> ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) e. U ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. U ) -> ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) e. U ) |
| 12 | 1, 5 | #P_unitmulcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) e. U ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) e. U ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syld3an3 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( ( invr ` R ) ` Y ) ) e. U ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. U /\ Y e. U ) -> ( X ./ Y ) e. U ) |
